ValidationRule.description: CMCM 711: Job Categories Sales, FAS, FAS/Sales, FAS/Clinical Specialist, FSE,Sales/Clinical Specialistâ€‹ cannot be selected when Access Configuration = ICE/LMS Only Access - NO ICPP ACCESS
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName== $Label.PortalRequestAddTeamMember, RecordType.DeveloperName== $Label.PortalRequestUpdateMemberRequest ), (TEXT(Access_Configuration__c) == $Label.ICE_LMS_Only_Access_NO_ICPP_ACCESS), OR( (TEXT(Job_Category__c) == $Label.FAS), (TEXT(Job_Category__c) == $Label.FAS_Clinical_Specialist), (TEXT(Job_Category__c) == $Label.FAS_Sales), (TEXT(Job_Category__c) == $Label.FSE), (TEXT(Job_Category__c) == $Label.Sales), (TEXT(Job_Category__c) == $Label.Sales_Clinical_Specialist) ), /*Bypass criterias are mentioned below*/ NOT ( OR ( $Setup.cs_Apex_Settings__c.Bypass_All_Validations__c, $Profile.Name = $Label.ProfileSystemAdmin ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Job Category selected typically needs ICPP access. If ICPP access is needed, do not use the "ICE/LMS Only" Access Configuration option; select a different Access Configuration to get ICPP access.
